item.title: An archbishop's knock formally restores Notre Dame to life as winds howl and heads of state look on
item.description: With three resounding knocks on its doors, the monument roared back to life Saturday evening.

item.title: Trump is welcomed by Macron to Paris with presidential pomp and joined by Zelenskyy for their talks
item.description: French President Emmanuel Macron welcomed Donald Trump to Paris on Saturday as the men resumed the relationship they established during Trump's first ...

item.title: U.S. unveils $988 million aid package for Ukraine including rockets and drones
item.description: The United States unveiled a $988 million aid package of new arms and equipment to Ukraine for its ongoing fight against Russia's invasion on Saturday...

item.title: AI's growth is just getting started, BlackRock's thematic ETF head says
item.description: BlackRock's Jay Jacobs expects infrastructure and cybersecurity plays to shine in 2025. He cites the artificial intelligence boom as a major catalyst.

item.title: Bank of America says these stocks are 'firing on all cylinders' so buy them now
item.description: Bank of America revealed a slew of stocks that the firm believes have more room to run.
